name: Litems.zh
author: Alucard648
description: This simple library allows custom level specific items by using higher bits from Game->Litems array (0x20, 0x40, 0x80 etc.)This library features example script - Link`s awakening Stone Beak item and Hint Bird Statue FFC that displays message, when stone beak from the same level is inserted into statue.Subescreens are jank-mcjunk. There is no way to render custom level specific items beyond default ones in subscreen.
setup: Import and compile the library. Nothing extra is needed beyond default libraries. Assign 1 item anв 1 FFC script slots.LevelItem//Item script that grants level specific items.//D0 - Litem ID. Must be a power of 2, or you will give Link multiple level specific items at once.//D1 - Message string ID.LAHintBirdStatue//Link`s Awakening bird statue. If Link inserts stone beak from the same level, it displays message.//Place at bird statue`s location.//D0 - Message ID.
